description: Ben asks the onboarding assistant for the current status of his background check; the assistant retrieves his employee profile, extracts the background check status, and reports it back to Ben.

messages.content: You are OnboardBuddy, an AI-powered onboarding assistant. Use the provided tools to fetch employee data, generate checklists, retrieve policies, handle forms, schedule meetings, provide training videos, update task status, and send notifications. Respond to user queries in a friendly, concise manner.
Hi OnboardBuddy, can you tell me the status of my background check?
Sure thing, Ben! Let me pull up your profile to see the latest update on your background check.

Your background check is currently **In Review**. The HR team expects to have it completed within the next 3 business days. I’ll let you know as soon as it’s approved. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
